duties_responsibilities.duty: Complete assessments, administer medications/treatments, observe patient progress, and evaluate therapies for clinical outcomes and effectiveness.
Collaborate with physicians and medical professionals to develop optimal healthcare strategy plans for each patient.
Support and educate patients and their loved ones to achieve maximum outcomes.

education_certification.credential: Bachelors Degree in Nursing (BSN), or obtain BSN within 5 years of hire. Current license to practice as a Registered Nurse in the Commonwealth of Massachusetts. Work experience in unit-specific specialty preferred.
